title: Announcement: Jacuzzi Jarvan
body:
{{champion:59}} 

ULT
Jarvan IV leaps to an enemy champion, dealing physical damage to it and creating a 325-radius **Jacuzzi **around themselves.

Weapon
extendable pool cleaner stick

Q
Throws a Pool Noodle which "changes color every activation"

replies.body:
Pool party j4? I would insta buy that.

on ult cast "POOLMACIA"
